languages.text: Мощные залпы корабельных орудий взрывают поверхность мира, ставшего из поля боя местом смерти для ксеносов. Вместе с ними в пепел обращаются ксеносские корабли, могучие деревья и даже окружающие скалы. С обриты зарево рыжего пламени выглядит словно рваная рана, медленно расползающаяся по лику зеленой планеты.

traits.locale_text: Мощные залпы корабельных орудий взрывают поверхность мира, ставшего из поля боя местом смерти для ксеносов. Вместе с ними в пепел обращаются ксеносские корабли, могучие деревья и даже окружающие скалы. С обриты зарево рыжего пламени выглядит словно рваная рана, медленно расползающаяся по лику зеленой планеты.

languages.text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.
languages.original_text: Мощные залпы корабельных орудий взрывают поверхность мира, ставшего из поля боя местом смерти для ксеносов. Вместе с ними в пепел обращаются ксеносские корабли, могучие деревья и даже окружающие скалы. С обриты зарево рыжего пламени выглядит словно рваная рана, медленно расползающаяся по лику зеленой планеты.

traits.locale_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into dying grounds for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, of great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, of great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

languages.text: 舰载宏炮的强大火力撕碎了地表，把战场变成了异形的屠宰场。异形的舰船、周围的树木，甚至连附近的悬崖也这群异形一起化成了灰烬。从轨道上看，红色的火光看起来像绽裂的伤口，在行星的绿色表面慢慢蔓延。
languages.original_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

traits.locale_text: 舰载巨炮的强大火力撕碎了地表，把战场变成了异形的屠宰场。异形的舰船、周围的树木，甚至连附近的悬崖也这群异形一起化成了灰烬。从轨道上看，红色的火光看起来像绽裂的伤口，在行星的绿色表面慢慢蔓延。

languages.text: 船の兵器が放つ強力な爆風が惑星の地表を引き裂き、戦場は異種族の殺戮の場と化す。戦場には、船の灰、大木の灰、そして近くの崖の灰までもが舞う。軌道上から見ると、赤い炎の輝きはまるで傷口のようであり、それはゆっくりと緑色の地表に広がっていく。
languages.original_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

traits.locale_text: 船の兵器が放つ強力な爆風が惑星の地表を引き裂き、戦場は異種族の殺戮の場と化す。戦場には、船の灰、大木の灰、そして近くの崖の灰までもが舞う。軌道上から見ると、赤い炎の輝きはまるで傷口のようであり、それはゆっくりと緑色の地表に広がっていく。

languages.text: Las potentes ráfagas de las armas de la nave desgarran la superficie del mundo, convirtiendo el campo de batalla en un campo de exterminio para los xenos. A estos se unen las cenizas de sus naves, de grandes árboles e incluso de los acantilados cercanos. Desde la órbita, el resplandor de las llamas rojas parece una herida abierta que se extiende lentamente sobre la verde superficie.
languages.original_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

traits.locale_text: Las potentes ráfagas de las armas de la nave desgarran la superficie del mundo, convirtiendo el campo de batalla en un campo de exterminio para los xenos. A estos se unen las cenizas de sus naves, de grandes árboles e incluso de los acantilados cercanos. Desde la órbita, el resplandor de las llamas rojas parece una {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} abierta que se extiende lentamente sobre la verde superficie.

languages.text: Mächtige Schüsse aus den Waffen des Schiffs zerfetzen die Oberfläche der Welt und verwandeln das Schlachtfeld in eine Todesfalle für die Xenos. Auch die Asche ihrer Schiffe gesellt sich noch dazu, großer Bäume und sogar der nahegelegenen Klippen. Vom Orbit aus sieht das Leuchten der roten Flamme aus wie eine klaffende Wunde, die sich langsam über die grüne Oberfläche des Planeten ausbreitet.
languages.original_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

traits.locale_text: Mächtige Schüsse aus den Waffen des Schiffs zerfetzen die Oberfläche der Welt und verwandeln das Schlachtfeld in eine Todesfalle für die Xenos. Auch die Asche ihrer Schiffe gesellt sich noch dazu, großer Bäume und sogar der nahegelegenen Klippen. Vom Orbit aus sieht das Leuchten der roten Flamme aus wie eine klaffende Wunde, die sich langsam über die grüne Oberfläche des Planeten ausbreitet.

languages.text: Les redoutables tirs d'artillerie du vaisseau dévastent la surface de la planète, transformant le champ de bataille en abattoir pour xénos. Ces derniers sont suivis de peu par les cendres de leurs vaisseaux, des grands arbres environnants et même des falaises proches. Depuis l'orbite, la lueur rouge des flammes ressemble à une plaie béante qui se propage lentement sur la surface verte de la planète.
languages.original_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.

traits.locale_text: Les redoutables tirs d'artillerie du vaisseau dévastent la surface de la planète, transformant le champ de bataille en abattoir pour xénos. Ces derniers sont suivis de peu par les cendres de leurs vaisseaux, des grands arbres environnants et même des falaises proches. Depuis l'orbite, la lueur rouge des flammes ressemble à une plaie béante qui se propage lentement sur la surface verte de la planète.

languages.text: Geminin silahlarının yarattığı güçlü patlamalar, dünyanın yüzeyini parçalayarak çatışma alanını zenolar için bir mezarlığa dönüştürüyor. Zenolarla birlikte gemilerinden geriye kalanlar, büyük ağaçlar ve hatta civardaki kayalıklar bile ortadan kalkıyor. Yörüngeden bakıldığında aşağıda görülen kızıl parıltı, gezegenin yeşil yüzeyinde büyüyen açık bir yaraya benziyor.
languages.original_text: Powerful blasts from the ship's weaponry tear up the world's surface, turning the battlefield into a killing ground for the xenos. The latter are joined by the ashes of their ships, great trees, and even of the nearby cliffs. From orbit, the glow of red flame looks like a gaping wound, slowly spreading over the planet's green surface.
